name: Hololore: Amethyst
description:
CONTROLS: 

Action Gameboy Keyboard Interact/Jump A Z Movement D-Pad Arrow Keys

HOLOLORE : AMETHYST [Chapter 1]

A fanmade Hololive narrative adventure game. Hoshimachi Suisei, one of Tokyo's known singers, is informed by her Promoter of a disturbance that could not only distract from her concert, but one that could disrupt the daily lives of Tokyo citizens. Somehow, newcomer star Hoshinova Moona and rabbit CEO Usada Pekora get tangled into the web of misunderstandings, and a journey of friendships.

Original Story by: Angelily
Written by: Angelily
Illustrated by: Angelily
Programmed by: Angelily
Music Credits: Mod Archive GitHub
 GB Studio Community Assets
